tweet:
Since day one, Speaker Pelosi & DC Democrats have sought to remove this president from office by any means necessary. With today's vote, they are simply seeking to legitimize a process that has been illegitimate from the start. 

My full statement ↓ http://bit.ly/2Wu0MYY

As baseball fans tune in for Game 7 of the World Series tonight, Nancy Pelosi is readying her pitch to Congress on the rules for her sham impeachment inquiry.

Strike 1: No Due Process. 
Strike 2: No co-equal subpoena authority.
Strike 3: No transparency for the American people. pic.twitter.com/L84hql7sGc

Today, I’m wearing purple for #DomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth. Earlier this year, I was proud to vote to reauthorize #VAWA to ensure victims get the help they need. If you need help, please visit  http://thehotline.org  or call 1-800-799-7233 for a free confidential conversation. pic.twitter.com/Y4FxPoTbys

Big moment in @NatResources @NRDems when Chairman @RepRaulGrijalva reached across the aisle to support my bill to make @CahokiaMounds a national park. Plenty of work remains, but this is a huge step forward. Thanks to Mary Vandevord w/HeartLands Conservancy for her testimony! pic.twitter.com/guMmtKM2cd

At the International Association of Chiefs of Police conference w/@POTUS, I had the opportunity to meet American hero Mark “Oz” Geist, who was part of the Annex Security Team that was on the ground during the Sept 11, 2012 Benghazi attack. Mark helped save over 25 American lives. pic.twitter.com/MZJ0vo2HnW

I was honored to join @POTUS @realDonaldTrump this morning for the International Association of Chiefs of Police conference in Chicago. I also enjoyed my time with the president on Marine One and then Air Force One for our flight back to DC! pic.twitter.com/rs36fraoWA
Congratulations @JoeBReporter! I’ve enjoyed our many conversations over the years. Illinois’ loss is South Carolina’s gain! https://twitter.com/JoeBReporter/status/1188847827121852417 …

The death of Abu Bakr Al-Baghdadi is a triumph for the US & a testament to the US special ops forces who risked their lives to accomplish this dangerous mission. ISIS has been decimated in recent yrs & now has lost their leader. @POTUS is right: something very big has happened.

More than 100,000 former miners across the US rely on their UMWA pensions. But, the plan is projected to be insolvent in 2022 if Congress doesn’t act. This week, I sent a letter urging Speaker Pelosi to bring the Miners Pension Protection Act to the House floor for a vote ASAP. pic.twitter.com/Wg4pkB54QT

Access to quality health care shouldn’t be dependent on where you live. Excited to share that 2 Southern IL hospitals are now participating in a @DeltaRegional technical assistance program so that they can continue providing folks with the care they need. http://bit.ly/2Wl5k3W

With over 2,000 Illinoisans falling victim to opioid-related deaths in 2018, it's critical we find solutions to end this crisis. Saturday is #TakeBackDay, where you can safely dispose of your old, unwanted, or unused medications. Here's where you can bring them in Southern IL ↓ pic.twitter.com/ht9Bh8iVus

Yesterday @NatResources passed the Miners Pension Protection Act. I joined @RepConorLamb, @RepMcKinley, @Sen_JoeManchin & miners to call upon Speaker Pelosi to bring it to the floor for a vote. Southern IL has a proud mining history. It’s time miners get the support they deserve. pic.twitter.com/tIHOIzPvTK

I’m a member of Congress, yet Pelosi & Schiff believe I have no right to review the testimony of their impeachment inquiry b/c I don't sit on the committee of jurisdiction. I sent a letter to Chairman Schiff requesting access to the transcript from Ambassador Volker’s interview. pic.twitter.com/93SCgNgs9a

36 years ago, 241 service members – including 220 of my fellow Marines – were killed when a member of Hezbollah drove a truck bomb into the @USMC Barracks in Beirut. I'm proud to cosponsor the #OORAHAct to help give justice to the victims & their families. #SemperFi https://twitter.com/USMC/status/1186975557520478208 …

Are you a college student interested in Congress and the legislative process? My DC office is now accepting applications for spring interns! Visit  http://bost.house.gov/services/internships … for more info and to apply. pic.twitter.com/peCkYf8Agi

Last night, @HouseGOP tried to call for a vote on a resolution to censure Chairman Adam Schiff for lying to the American people. Speaker Pelosi blocked the vote. Democrats say they want transparency & accountability - unless it’s one of their own. Talk about a double standard.

Today, the House will vote on a resolution to censure Chairman Adam Schiff for spreading false accusations and using his position to mislead the American people. I cosponsored this resolution because it's past time he is held accountable. Read the resolution here ↓ pic.twitter.com/RbFTdLpu1R

Some good news for veterans – This year, @POTUS signed a bill I helped introduce to provide cost-of-living adjustments to veterans at the same percentage as Social Security beneficiaries. @SocialSecurity recently announced that the 2020 rate will be 1.6%. http://bit.ly/35CCBvy
Happy 100th birthday to O’Fallon @AmericanLegion Post 137! Thank you for all you’ve done to provide local veterans with services, support and fellowship over the past 100 years! http://bit.ly/2BdKJ7Z
Speaker Pelosi’s impeachment inquiry has been questionable from the start.  Here’s 10 of them… pic.twitter.com/FAlQN72Nqc

Thanks to Joycelyn Farmer from Fairview Heights and folks from the @American_Heart for stopping by my office today! We discussed federal funding for new treatments and cures for heart conditions and the importance of protecting patients from receiving surprise medical bills. pic.twitter.com/PwRl09iUjX

Tracy & I send our prayers to the wife & family of Rep. Elijah Cummings, who passed away this morning. Mr. Cummings was a passionate fighter for his hometown of Baltimore and a leader for civil rights. May he rest in peace & may his family find comfort during this difficult time.
This afternoon I joined a bipartisan majority of my House colleagues in opposing the withdrawal of U.S. military personnel from northern Syria. The resolution passed the House by a 354-60 margin.

Medicare open enrollment has begun! From now until December 7th, you can enroll in a Medicare Advantage Plan, Prescription Drug Plan, or change your plan to one that better meets your needs. Visit  http://medicare.gov  or call 1-800-633-4227 for more information. pic.twitter.com/ZkrbnmCn2z

Another investment in Southern Illinois' infrastructure! The Lake of Egypt Water District in Marion has received a $340,000 investment from @DeltaRegional to expand water and sewer systems.

More info ↓ http://bit.ly/31fn8OM
Happy 244th birthday to @USNavy! Thank you to the brave men and women who have served and who continue to serve our nation! #244NavyBday https://twitter.com/DeptofDefense/status/1183321479804375046 …

Started my morning at the @alzIllinois Walk to End Alzheimer’s in Marion. With the support of organizations like the Alzheimer’s Association and everyone who joined us this morning, we are making progress in the fight against this devastating disease. #EndAlz pic.twitter.com/WsY81KaKGd

Excited to share that @DeltaRegional is investing $950,000 in 7 projects to strengthen Southern IL’s infrastructure, workforce & economy – 6 of which are in our district. Investments like these have helped create & support thousands of jobs in our region. http://bit.ly/2OEhq6g

Introducing the legislation that created the School Violence Prevention Program is one of my proudest accomplishments in Congress. I’m pleased to share that 3 Southern IL communities received over $1.1 million to strengthen security in local schools. ↓ http://bit.ly/33hYmyM

Yesterday, I stopped by @SIUC to discuss nutrition policy and the legislative process with students in College of Agricultural Sciences. Thanks for having me and asking great questions! pic.twitter.com/2Ptiuyp2f5
Congrats to the @Cardinals on a decisive 13-1 win over the Atlanta Braves! #NLCS bound for the first time since 2014! #TimeToFly https://twitter.com/Cardinals/status/1182088151864631298 …

Nancy Pelosi and the Washington Democrats are racing ahead of the facts, violating bipartisan precedent in order to pursue a secretive, closed-door impeachment of the president. 

More ↓ http://bit.ly/2Mq7Sct

Thanks to the Illinois REALTORS for inviting me to your meeting in Belleville last night! We discussed issues important to our local realtors and homebuyers, like infrastructure, flood insurance, tax reform, and healthcare. pic.twitter.com/je2pewM3US

Excited to share that the Egyptian Telephone Cooperative Association is receiving a @USDA loan of over $13 million to make improvements that will benefit 4,500 customers, including folks in St. Libory.

More info ↓ http://bit.ly/35arppX
Support for national park status for @CahokiaMounds is growing! I’m proud to lead the effort in the House to preserve this archaeological treasure for years to come. http://bit.ly/2VcKwLr

Thank you for visiting, @DrPhilRoe! It was great to have you in Southern Illinois to hear directly from veterans about the challenges they face and discuss ways we can help them through our work on @HouseVetAffairs! https://twitter.com/DrPhilRoe/status/1180211808935825410 …

Good news for Southern IL farmers – Excited to share @POTUS's announcement on the Renewable Fuel Standard. It includes relief for Small Refinery Exemption waivers & ensures 15 billion gallons of conventional ethanol will be blended into our fuel supply. http://bit.ly/330wdMD

Finally getting the public recognition you deserve @JoeBReporter! Enjoyed another of our many conversations about issues impacting Southern Illinois and America! https://twitter.com/bellevillenewsd/status/1179870827627646996 …

This morning, I sat down with Joe Bustos and Gary Dotson from the @bellevillenewsd to talk everything from the Farm Bill and the #USMCA to Pelosi’s impeachment inquiry and Southern Illinois coal. pic.twitter.com/kJ71qUs7Ya

The last stop on our Veterans Tour was John Cochran VA Hospital, where we were joined by @RepAnnWagner. A flagship site for the VA Whole Health Program, I wanted to make sure @DrPhilRoe had a chance to see the advances they’re making in healthcare before he heads home. pic.twitter.com/DaJ0ecT4EG

Thanks to everyone who came to our Veterans Forum at the Caseyville Memorial VFW Post 1117. @DrPhilRoe & I gave an update on our work on @HouseVetAffairs & we discussed how the federal govt can best serve veterans’ needs. Your feedback is what our Veterans Tour is all about. pic.twitter.com/4Zv5HMZE6X

During our visit to St. Elizabeth’s Hospital as part of our Veterans Tour, @DrPhilRoe & I met w/ physicians & administrators to discuss issues they see day in & day out, like veterans healthcare, mental health & the opioid crisis. Thanks to those at @stelizHSHS who participated! pic.twitter.com/zwLPCQyPUX

This morning, I kicked off my Southern Illinois Veterans Tour with @HouseVetAffairs Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe with a visit to the @MarionVA. We met with Director Ginsberg & employees to answer questions & hear directly from them about the work they’re doing to care for veterans. pic.twitter.com/waK8M9jGZ3

It’s always an honor to welcome home Honor Flight veterans coming back to Southern Illinois from their trip to Washington. As Americans, we owe a debt of gratitude to our nation’s greatest individuals — those who have served in defense of our freedom. Thank you for your service. pic.twitter.com/PZT8KCQ6u2

Tonight I welcome @HouseVetAffairs Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe back to Southern Illinois for our Veterans Tour. We're working to ensure that the government’s promise made to take care of our veterans is a promise kept. Here's some of the work we’ve been doing to fight for veterans: pic.twitter.com/TjibbAawIc

I stopped by Two Bugs & a Bean in Carbondale, where Les & Christine O’Dell run the Foster Family Resource Center. Through donations & proceeds from the store, they’re able support local foster families who open their homes to ensure that every child has a safe, loving family. pic.twitter.com/a2A7iBcVv2
